channel.title: Posts on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on A Hugo website

item.title: Подсчет длительности событий с инородными вставками внутри
item.description: После сканирования карты лояльности в режиме добавления товара в логи не записывается CREP 2002 (в sample это add_item)??? Иначе какой смысл выделять сканирование карты, когда можно было бы просто считать приобретение карты обычным добавлением товара в чек? base_dt <- readRDS(here::here("data", "sample_dt.Rds")) dt <- base_dt %>% select(pos_uid, timestamp, event, session_id) %>% as.data.table() open_dt <- dt[event == "open"] %>% .[, `:=`(event = "add_item", start = 1L)] # трюк №1. open превратим только в начало (!

item.title: Занимательные внешние репозитории
item.description: Различные репозитории, содержащие интересную периодику по тематике DS Materials for rstudio::conf. Materials for rstudio::conf Materials for the rstudio::conf 2019 Advanced R Markdown workshop https://arm.rbind.io Presentations, meetups and talks about ClickHouse https://www.youtube.com/c/ClickHouseDB Course contents for Master the Tidyverse rstudio/shiny-examples. This is a collection of Shiny examples. Sharing two #rstats functions, most days. WinVector various examples for different articles Shiny Application to test regular expressions in R https://spannbaueradam.shinyapps.io/r… Ozan Jaquette RClass.

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc. There are many differences in syntax between Blackfriday’s Markdown and Pandoc’s Markdown.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
